solution_line_template: Jennifer bought twice as many as Emily (who bought {emily_candies} candies) which is {emily_candies}*{jennifer_multiplier_emily} = <<{emily_candies}*{jennifer_multiplier_emily}={jennifer_candies}>>{jennifer_candies} candies

Dividing both sides of the equation by {jennifer_multiplier_bob} gives: Number of candies Bob bought = {jennifer_candies}/{jennifer_multiplier_bob} = <<{jennifer_candies}/{jennifer_multiplier_bob}={bob_candies}>>{bob_candies} candies
